author: lcfilipe
title: Weird but fun
review:
This is a very strange model, as it consists of a car shell with relatively little functionality. It is built in two parts, with the outer part only connected in few places to the mainframe.

In spite of the weird look, the model is interesting: it lifts itself on support wheels, exposing the underside (for repair, I assume). As far as I know, it's the only Technic model doing this kind of thing, which makes it more fun to build - it's not just a repeat of usual constructions in other models.

The B model is a dragster, also quite nice.
